title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Fresh vegetables quickly cooked in a wok with soy sauce and ginger.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic homemade cookies with melted chocolate chips and crispy edges.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Crispy taco shells filled with seasoned ground beef and fresh toppings.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese.
